UniprotID	Q9NS73

EntryName	MBIP1_HUMAN
ProteinName	MAP3K12-binding inhibitory protein 1 (MAPK upstream kinase-binding inhibitory protein) (MUK-binding inhibitory protein)
GeneName	MBIP BM-015
Length	344
Function	Inhibits the MAP3K12 activity to induce the activation of the JNK/SAPK pathway. Component of the ATAC complex, a complex with histone acetyltransferase activity on histones H3 and H4.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Cytoplasm
